column4: I have a DVD a friend burnt to disc for me. In one section there are photos in mpg format and the other is a Webcam video converted to mpg. I am trying to copy the DVD to send to a friend but I am finding it pretty impossible to do with all the tools I have. Any ideas please to help me?
CaSHMoNey: What is ISO Master? Sorry, is it a repos?
Is it a data dvd? Couldn't you just copy the files in Nautilus?
Its a DVD with photos and a webcam video, dont know if this makes it DATA, but I did copy and it didnt work
